prompt: I want to get better at trail running. My main goal is to run further, not faster.
completion: Increase distance gradually. Mix hill sprints, long runs, and strength training. Prioritize rest days.

prompt: I want to look good so that my girlfriend likes me again.
completion: Start strength training, add cardio, balanced diet.

prompt: I want to improve my mental health.
completion: Yoga and meditation every morning, followed by evening walks.

prompt: I want to lose weight in a sustainable way.
completion: Eat balanced meals, do cardio 3 times a week, strength training 2 times a week.

prompt: I want to be able to do 10 pull-ups. I cant do any right now.
completion: Start with bodyweight row exercises, dead hangs, negative pull-ups, and band-assisted pull-ups.

prompt: I want to lower my blood pressure
completion: Regular cardio, low-sodium diet, stress-reducing activities like yoga and meditation.
